description:
Do you want to learn how to make money trading stocks from the comfort of your own home?

If the answer is 'yes' then you have come to the right place!

In this course you will be taught all the fundamentals of stocks and trading you need to know to start trading in the global financial markets.

After completing this course you will be equipped with the knowledge, strategies and tools you need to successfully trade stocks and generate extra income for yourself.

The course is broken down into three sections: The Theory & Fundamentals of Stocks, Putting The Theory Into Practise and the Bonus Section.

This course is taught by a financial markets professional who has worked at several major investment banks in the City of London and delivers a clear and concise step by step course for beginners on how to get started with trading stocks and making money in the stock market.
title: Stocks For Beginners - A Guide To Investing
